posts.description: Vincent Dignan | Should you use fake users on your app?
posts.extended: I met or spoke with hundreds of startup founders last year. In coffeeshops at SXSW, mentoring at accelerators like London Business School, MassChallenge and IncuBus, and after giving talks around the world. If they sought out my advice and were building an app (e.g.

posts.description: What Twitter Really Means for Islamic State Supporters
posts.extended: Abu Ahmad, one of Islamic State’s most active supporters online says he has had over 90 Twitter accounts suspended, but is not planning to slow down.
